data.text: @jambu23 Hi Jan, have you already written to our Baggage Competence Center at baggage@airdolomiti.it ? Here you can find the complete procedure Post-flight assistance | Air Dolomiti
@ejonax Hi, flights operated and managed by us are all correctly scheduled. We stay at your disposal for any further needs, thank you.
@mrsmadai Hi, on board we do not sell products or gadgets. We stay at your disposal, have a nice day!
@mrsmadai Hi, how can we help you?

Do you know what the 'water cannon' or 'water arch' is? 💦
It's a cerimonial salute for celebrating milestones such as the inauguration of a new route or the last flight of a type of aircraft.
Have you ever been a passenger on board during one of this special events? 😍
#AdAstra https://t.co/bMFLkNiK0a
@odtuna We are deeply sorry to hear that. Please send us a DM with your file reference, thank you.
@cheecheesaysay We are sorry about your delayed bag. Please DM us with your file reference number, and we'll do our best to assist you. Thank you.
@ulkerciner We are sorry to hear about your delayed bag. Please DM us with your file reference number, thank you.
@RoesSvenja If you wish, you can DM us to check together if you filled out the right form or if there's anything else we can do from this social channel. Thank you!
@RoesSvenja Hi Svenja, if we can assist you with our flight from Bari to Munich, please DM us. If you have a connecting flight with Lufthansa, kindly contact our colleagues. Thank you.

data.text:
This year we decided to support @Fondoambiente by joining the Corporate Golden Donor membership programme. 
Alongside the FAI, we want to carry out a major project that is also an ambitious cultural challenge: to make Italy a better place to live, work and raise our children in💚 https://t.co/k7FeV80vnz
@Cheechfarmer Dear Jane, we have informed our Baggage Center about what you have reported to us. You will receive further information directly from them. Thank you.

urls.title: PRIDE! THERE’S A TOUCH OF TURQUOISE IN THE RAINBOW TOO | Air Dolomiti Blog
urls.description: The original rainbow flag was created by US artist and activist Gilbert Baker, who died in March 2017 in New York.

data.text:
What are the hidden meanings behind the colours of the rainbow flag? Write your favourite colour in the comments!
...ours is TURQUOISE! 💙
Read more on our #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/BXLl9Poi2P https://t.co/ilPrnHB2nQ
@Cheechfarmer Dear Jane, they've asked for the content list and not for external details of the bag. In any case, kindly answer to their email. Thank you.

@Cheechfarmer Dear Jane, from the Baggage Center they inform us that they sent an email on 11 August asking for information about your baggage, but never received a reply. Kindly keep in touch with them, thank you.
@Cheechfarmer Hi Jane, we really apologize. We just sent a new internal reminder to our Baggage Center. Thank you.

@marinaa051 Hi Marina, our apologize. We just sent a new internal reminder to our Baggage Center. If you filed a claim with them, you can send a reminder by using the dedicate form here: https://t.co/54prB2goa1

✨ The magic of watching an opera under a star-filled sky has made this summer truly unforgettable. 
Singing, music, history, dance and costumes 🎭 are the protagonists this season.
You can experience an enchanting performance until 4 September 😍 
#inArena @arenadiverona https://t.co/aDtAFYFoqk

@whereisemil Hi Emil!

Yes, sometimes the best option is to divert a flight. 
Our aim is always to keep safe all our passengers!
Steph
SocialMediaTeam

Today is World Photography Day 📸 and we all have a habit of taking pictures of the same subjects.
What do you like to capture on camera most? Let us know! 😉
As you've probably noticed, we can't get enough of this incredible view ✈️💙 
#AdAstra

ph. credits @gabriel_tacconi https://t.co/uZT9p4ybtm

urls.title: Cabin Crew Initial in | Careers at Air Dolomiti Spa

data.text:
✈️ Turn your passion for flying into a job!
Are you over 18 years old and have a secondary school diploma?
If you are dynamic and enterprising, don't miss this opportunity! 😎
Click and participate in our selection process! 👉 https://t.co/bhxHGNmCL1
#WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/nj7EMQiaQH

@handmadebyeliz Hi Eliz, we understand your frustration and we deeply apologize. We just sent a new internal reminder to our Baggage Center, they are working on your file together with the airports involved. Thank you.
@HoffmanSam1 If you have already submitted your request to our Baggage Competence Center, you will receive updates from colleagues who deal directly with lost luggage. Thank you

@HoffmanSam1 Hi Sam! For all updates related to the status of lost baggage you can contact our Baggage Compentece Center directly by following the instructions on our website: Post-flight assistance | Air Dolomiti
Thank you
@pigpen79 Dear Oliver, we're sorry to hear about your delayed bag. Please write us your file reference in DM, and we'll do our best to assist you. Thank you.
@handmadebyeliz Hi again Eliz, we have sent a new internal reminder to our Baggage Center, they are working on your file and will give you a feedback as soon as they can. Thank you.

@marinaa051 Please check here on their website: https://t.co/deZgwmkblh
Thank you.

Last-minute trip? ⏰
Don't worry, @EA_Italia has got you covered with a range of  solutions! Compare conditions and choose the best option to suit your needs 👉 https://t.co/d9fBLfXFMa https://t.co/RYdmwg4UA4

urls.title: Travel insurance policy | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Select the travel insurance policy that suits your needs from the options provided by Air Dolomiti and activate extra coverage

data.text: @malicewi Dear Maria, we are sorry to hear about your delayed bag. Please DM us with your file reference number, thank you.
@marinaa051 Dear Marina, both us and the airports involved can see your messages. Please get in touch with Turin Airport to check any updates to your file, thank you for your cooperation.

@marinaa051 Hi M, we are sorry for the situation. As anticipated we kindly ask you to follow the procedure here https://t.co/54prB2goa1, as in the first 5 days you can directly contact the Lost&Found of the airport

@HoffmanSam1 Hi Sam, we are really sorry. Please note that, since we are still in the 5 days after the flight, you should directly contact the Lost&Found of the airport. You can find the procedure here https://t.co/54prB2goa1
@Cheechfarmer Hi Jane, I confirm you that, as anticipated, our colleagues will contact you as soon as possible

@Cheechfarmer Dear Jane, we are really sorry. As anticipated, due to the high amount of request received by our Customer Relations, times are longer than usual. They will give you a feedback as soon as possible. 
Thank you for your patience and understanding
@mmpeck Hi Michele, thank you for sharing the news, we are really pleased to read that you received your bags back and once again we are sorry for the the inconveniences you encountered

A window seat with a coastal panorama is a delight for the eyes 🌊
But if you want to delight all of your senses, combine fine dining with a stunning sea view for the ultimate taste experience! 👉 https://t.co/UmhpcPgN4t https://t.co/6FMQ1YJvZZ

@chicago_sailor1 @lufthansa Hi Adam, could you please write us via DM your booking reference or ticket number? Alternatively, you can directly write it to salescenter@airdolomiti.it, so that the colleague will be able to check everything

urls.title: Inflight service Settimocielo| Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Check out the on-board service offered on Air Dolomiti flights according to the fare you have purchased.

data.text:
It was 1963 when the grandfather opened the family restaurant and in 2006 the chef Paolo Trippini decided to carry on the tradition. Today, he is one of the talented JREs in Italy and his dishes make up our onboard menu. 
Find out more 👉 https://t.co/8KKvyGnNam
#SpazioItaliaBar https://t.co/lT8pYpNJK2

@TuzoHughes Hi Tony, we are really sorry to hear about your delayed bag. Please get in touch with our dept. in charge, they will give you all details about this procedure: baggage@airdolomiti.it
Thank you.
@Rmds9999 @lufthansa Dear Rose, we are sorry to hear about your delayed bag. If your file reference is with *EN*, please send us a DM and we'll do our best to assist you. Thank you.

urls.title: ENJOY YOUR TRIP… WITH PEACE OF MIND! | Air Dolomiti Blog
urls.description: You may be surprised to discover that the first ever insurance in history was in fact a travel insurance policy!

data.text:

Already then people would think of how to travel with peace of mind! 😊
Discover our options on #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/g5TIZjAr6C https://t.co/jWzbtbBWA4

data.text: @Cheechfarmer Dear Jane, we thank you for your comprehension and we are going to send a new internal reminder. Thank you.
@marisa_castagno Dear Marisa, our CR department has already given you feedback, and your file is 100% under United's responsibility, which is why we invite you to contact them. Thank you.
@Cheechfarmer Dear Jane, we are working on the file together with our airport partners involved. we renew our apology for what occurred, and hope to be able to give you updates soon. Thank you.
@louroth84 1 pari, palla al centro 😉
@handmadebyeliz Dear Eliz, we kindly invite you to try to contact MAN lost&found, they are organizing the delivery of your luggage to your permanent address. Thank you.
@KomomeLoden Dear Loden, how can we assist you? Thank you.
@FranGut14331953 Dear Fran, we apologize for the incovenience occurred. Please DM us with your file reference number, thank you.
@alessiogori31 Dear Alessio, we are sorry about your delayed bag. Please send us a DM with your file reference, thank you.
@LukaNuic Hi Luka, thanks for your interest ✈️ our shop is currently closed but we are working on being online again in the coming months!
@kali0tis Hi, we are really sorry for the inconvenience and for this difficult situation. Have you already sent the request to baggage@airdolomiti.it? Thank you

@Itravelwithms We are really sorry for the longer than usual waiting time via online form/E-Mail, please note that for urgent matter you can also use the chat on our website or directly call our Sales Center at the number +39 045 2886140

@Itravelwithms Dear Kathryn, I confirm you that your request has been correctly received and you will receive a feedback as soon as possible. Please note that wheelchair assistance can be added also after flight booking (you just need to add it before the flight date)

@Itravelwithms Dear Kathryn, due to the high amount of requests received in the last weeks, waiting time is a little longer than usual, but every request always receives a feedback. If you wish you can also send us via DM your booking reference, so that we can check with our Sale
@linapetersilie Dear Lina, if you submitted the request through our website, could you please send us via private message the file reference that you received? Thank you

@lucianase_ Hi Luciana, thank you for the update, we are really happy to read that your baggage is with you again and that our support could help you! We are sure that also our colleagues are always doing their best to help all the passengers and we thank you very much for your p

@Aakash_Asokan Dear Aakash, thank you for the update, we are really pleased to read that your baggage is with you again. Once again we are sorry the inconveniences caused by this difficult situation and we thank you very much for your patience and understanding
@Milla_Camargo Dear Ludmilla, we are deeply sorry about your delayed bags. We have just sent a new internal reminder to our Baggage Center, which will get back to you as soon as possible.
@mmpeck Dear Michele, our Customer Care is available at +39 0452886140/Mon-Fri 8.30am-8pm/Sat-Sun 9am-5pm. Our Baggage Center is available via email only. Thank you.
@lucianase_ Dear Luciana, we are really sorry. We replied to your DM and other tweet, thank you.

data.text: @lucianase_ Dear Luciana, we deeply apologize for this situation. As mentioned, please stay in touch with us via DM. Kindly update us about our last msg. Thank you.

@mmpeck Our phone lines do not have automated systems, but real operators always available to assist our passengers. We have now sent a new internal reminder to our Baggage Center for your file, and we apologize again for your delayed bag. Thank you.

@Cheechfarmer Dear Jane,
we are really sorry and we understand your frustration. We have sent a new internal reminder for your case and we thank you in advance for your patience and cooperation.

Several circumstances are causing more luggage handling issues than usual. In case your bag does not land with you, here are some useful guidelines. All departments involved are working to provide maximum assistance and we apologise in advance should any inconvenience occur. 
#EN https://t.co/5gBOQyDIhi

@silvie_ita Dear Silvia,
in order to protect your privacy, we kindly invite you to write us your file reference number in private and we will be glad to check for updates.
Thanks for your cooperation, and sorry for the inconvenience.
Steph
@mmpeck As service center we are available via phone, chat, email and social media. We forwarded your claim to the department in charge. We apologize once again
@mmpeck We truly apologize for the inconvenience, we are doing our best to solve this out. We replyed to your DM
@eduardosanzb Dear Eduardo, please DM us by sending the Lufthansa case number. We'll verify internally if we have correctly received it. Thank you.

data.text: @jasonkap Hi Jason, we are sorry to hear about your bag. We replied to your request in DM, thank you.
@jasonkap Hi Jason, we are sorry to hear about your bag. We replied to your request in DM, thank you.

@Stephanie0317 Dear Stephanie, we are sorry to hear about your delayed bag. If your file is under EN, please get in touch with our dedicated dept., Baggage Center: baggage@airdolomiti.it
Our colleagues will give you a feedback as soon as possible. We apologize again.
@neffrw Dear Reef, we are deeply sorry. We have replied to your request in DM, thank you.

We know that the current situation is more challenging than expected for all of you who love to fly and travel. This is why we would like to share with you some advice that might be helpful.
#AirDolomiti https://t.co/3HpCyugs0e

@ciaoamy @DrDinD According to the procedure, during the first 5 days it remains in the hands of the airport that opened the file. After 5 days the file passes to the airline company. You can still refer to our Baggage Center. They will check the file coming back to you as quickly as possible

@agrawalrohit026 Dear Rohit,
we are sorry for the inconvenience.Can you provide us with your booking code by private message for your privacy protection? Thank you

@ciaoamy @DrDinD Dear Amy,
we are sorry for what happened. Have you already opened a claim with the Lost & Found at the arrival airport? You can also send your claim to our Baggage Centre at baggage@airdolomiti.it. Thank you
@Rat35385844 We are deeply sorry for the inconvenience and we remain at your complete disposal for any further information.

@Rat35385844 We apologize for the diversion, the safety of our passengers is our top priority. Should you need help with your ticket, please contact us at +390452886140. We are available today 'til 5pm. Thank you.

@MuzikDiyar Hi,

the flight EN8859 is still confirmed today at 6.55 pm Florence - Frankfurt.
If you need more information about your reservation you can contact our Customer Care via phone at +39 0452886140, available today from 9am to 5pm.

Air Dolomiti Team
